JobFullDesc: About the RoleThe Marketplace team tackles some of ANZ’s most sophisticated problems, on behalf of all ANZ cities. These problems often involve difficult analysis with large data sets, tough strategic decisions, and close collaboration with many different partners and the solutions can have groundbreaking impact. If you are a tenacious truth seeker, with exceptional attention to detail and a desire to lead multipart projects at a national scale, this is the team for youWhat You'll Do:Marketplace specifically looks at how to make our Eats marketplace fast and reliable at the lowest possible cost, while keeping all three sides of our marketplace engaged. By diving into issues such as marketplace forecasting, marketplace dynamics, delivery partner payment and incentives, and optimal marketplace settings, you will develop innovative approaches and strategies to run a healthy and balanced marketplace. Specifically, this means:Drive analysis on meaningful strategic decisions and inform business initiatives by understanding the key levers to improve the delivery experience, as well as our fundamental economics.Measure the impact of the strategies that you execute in order to drive continuous improvement across the business.Lead multi-functional teams that consist of other operations teams, product, sales, marketing, finance, etc. to ensure plans address broader critical initiatives.Communicate to senior regional ops leaders on projects/priorities; able to coordinate and lead effective meetings, collect and provides meaningful feedback & communicate priorities and goals effectively.Take ownership of new programs, processes, or pilots.What You'll Need:Bachelor or advanced degree in Maths, Computer Science, Business, Engineering, Science, Econometrics, or equivalent.3+ years of relevant experience.Experience leveraging multi-functional partners in order to manage and execute high-impact projects.Strong verbal and written communication skills.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment.Proven data analytics skills:SQL - able to build sophisticated tables & queries from scratch.Experience with statistics, Python, and/or R.Sophisticated in Excel / Google Sheets.Ability to map out processes and automate.About UberAt Uber, we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion. We take on big problems to help drivers, riders, delivery partners, and eaters get moving in more than 10,000 cities around the world.We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently. If you have the curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, work with us, and let’s move the world forward, together.
